name: Lone Mountain
description:
The mountain's signal has been lost due to the blizzard. Everything is blocked and you're the only one who can reboot the antennas. 

Walk through the blizzard and fix the problem ! But alone you may get lost. 

So equipped with your walkie talkie, Henry, a technician who knows the mountain, will help you to get through.

Made in one week during "Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2". (Theme : You're not alone)

__________________________________

Commands :

Move with WASD or the directional keys,  interact with E and click on icon with your mouse.

__________________________________

The game is designed to be played in 1920x1080 resolution. It adapts to over screen size, so it is playable, but not perfect.

__________________________________

Credits :

Development and sound

Art and animations
